name: PixelFem #12 - Marina Abramović
description:
Marina Abramović is a Serbian artist known for her vanguard performance pieces that use her body both as subject and vehicle. Abramović often braves dangerous or gruelling acts to investigate sensation and its effects, often with audience participation. “The function of the artist in a disturbed society is to give awareness of the universe, to ask the right questions, and to elevate the mind".

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
